description: Generates viral UGC/influencer-style scripts for Prompt Architect content (case studies, educational, how-tos, use cases) optimized for social media reels. Produces scripts with hooks, body, and CTAs in conversational influencer tone.

example_response.hook: The hook section of the script (first 3 seconds)
example_response.body: The body section of the script (main content)
example_response.title: A short title for the script
example_response.visual_notes: Visual direction notes for the creator
